    public class TcpSocketManager
extends AbstractSocketManager
    Manager of TCP Socket connections.

      • TcpSocketManager

        @Deprecated
public TcpSocketManager(String name,
                                    OutputStream os,
                                    Socket socket,
                                    InetAddress inetAddress,
                                    String host,
                                    int port,
                                    int connectTimeoutMillis,
                                    int reconnectionDelayMillis,
                                    boolean immediateFail,
                                    Layout<? extends Serializable> layout,
                                    int bufferSize)
        已过时。 Use TcpSocketManager(String, OutputStream, Socket, InetAddress, String, int, int, int, boolean, Layout, int, SocketOptions).
        Constructs.
        参数:
        name - The unique name of this connection.
        os - The OutputStream.
        socket - The Socket.
        inetAddress - The Internet address of the host.
        host - The name of the host.
        port - The port number on the host.
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds.
        reconnectionDelayMillis - Reconnection interval.
        immediateFail - True if the write should fail if no socket is immediately available.
        layout - The Layout.
        bufferSize - The buffer size.

                        OutputStream os,
                        Socket socket,
                        InetAddress inetAddress,

                        int port,

                        int reconnectionDelayMillis,
                        boolean immediateFail,
                        Layout<? extends Serializable> layout,
                        int bufferSize,
                        SocketOptions socketOptions)
        Constructs.
        参数:
        name - The unique name of this connection.
        os - The OutputStream.
        socket - The Socket.
        inetAddress - The Internet address of the host.
        host - The name of the host.
        port - The port number on the host.
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds.
        reconnectionDelayMillis - Reconnection interval.
        immediateFail - True if the write should fail if no socket is immediately available.
        layout - The Layout.
        bufferSize - The buffer size.

      • getSocketManager

        @Deprecated
public static TcpSocketManager getSocketManager(String host,
                                                            int port,
                                                            int connectTimeoutMillis,
                                                            int reconnectDelayMillis,
                                                            boolean immediateFail,
                                                            Layout<? extends Serializable> layout,
                                                            int bufferSize)
        已过时。 Use getSocketManager(String, int, int, int, boolean, Layout, int, SocketOptions).
        Obtains a TcpSocketManager.
        参数:
        host - The host to connect to.
        port - The port on the host.
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds
        reconnectDelayMillis - The interval to pause between retries.
        bufferSize - The buffer size.
        返回:
        A TcpSocketManager.

                                                int port,

        参数:
        host - The host to connect to.
        port - The port on the host.
        connectTimeoutMillis - the connect timeout in milliseconds
        reconnectDelayMillis - The interval to pause between retries.
        bufferSize - The buffer size.
        返回:

      • write

        protected void write(byte[] bytes,
                     int offset,
                     int length,
                     boolean immediateFlush)
        从类复制的说明: OutputStreamManager
        Some output streams synchronize writes while others do not. Synchronizing here insures that log events won't be intertwined.
        覆盖:
        write 在类中 OutputStreamManager
        参数:
        bytes - The serialized Log event.
        offset - The offset into the byte array.
        length - The number of bytes to write.
        immediateFlush - flushes immediately after writing.

      • getContentFormat

        public Map<String,String> getContentFormat()
        Gets this TcpSocketManager's content format. Specified by:
        • Key: "protocol" Value: "tcp"
        • Key: "direction" Value: "out"
        覆盖:
        getContentFormat 在类中 AbstractSocketManager
        返回:
        Map of content format keys supporting TcpSocketManager
